mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(R REPLY_PK)*/ ROWNUM RN, R.* FROM REPLY R WHERE R.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}) A WHERE A.RN > (#{page} - 1) * 5 AND A.RN <= (#{page}) * 5
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL AS REPLY_NO FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO REPLY (REPLY_NO, BOARD_NO, REPLY, REPLYER, REPLY_DATE) VALUES (#{replyNo}, #{boardNo}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, #{replyDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY = #{reply}, REPLYER = #{replyer}, REPLY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE REPLY_NO = #{replyNo}
